column5: Check out this ice storm video.  A least they have ice  My Webpage
Saw this video yesterday Joey...unbelievable footage!  Couldn't help but laugh cause of the "slow motion" accidents!
Wow, that looks like a bad combo of strong winds, icy roads and no snow tires.  I hope nobody got too badly hurt.  HF
lol the driver hit the gas in that video.  panicing always makes it worse!  CHeers!
not fast and furious but neat to see... wow... seems odd seeing cars skating sideways like that...  thanks for sharing!  Ger.

Hills and Ice don't mix well to begin with.  Add drivers that are not used to these weather conditions, and don't have proper tires etc and it's a recipe for disaster.  Reminds me of some old business trips to Vancouver during the rare snow or ice storms there in the past.
I cannot beleive people were stupid enough to be even walking around down there.  ACTUALLY YEAH I CAN.
WOW !!!  I guess the driver's just don't know enough to slow down. Shouldn't be on the roads at all in those conditions.
Unbelievable !!  Sorta looks like the DVP during a normal rush hour  ...........even without the ice
i dont see why there are people standing around on the streets and the person stepping on the gas?
its neat when its in slow motion and all you are waiting for is the crunch.....  thanks joey
